title: 07/07/21 DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: 07/07/21 DPS Hour 1
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan, react to Game 1 of the NBA Finals, as the Suns take a 1-0 lead. Were you surprised that Giannis took the floor in Game 1? The guys discuss the latest comments from Aaron Rodgers, as he continues to keep his status with the Packers mysterious. Plus, Shohei Ohtani or Fernando Tatis Jr., who are you starting your MLB franchise with right now?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
